title: Find the Mushroom Picker
content:
plant on the right side. If you trigger the Bibberbangs however, it will be destroyed. The dwarf requests that you get his backpack to him (or, you can give him a misty step scroll, and get the backpack later). The backpack contains a spell to make his escape easy. (You can use Mage Hand to get it, which won't trigger the Bibberbang) Once you saved the dwarf, he tells you that he must hurry and then leaves.

You can get the Noblestalk in the back right corner (quest item) and:

Keep for yoursel
